Name: Friends
Components: S, M (a small amount of makeup applied to the face as this spell is cast)

Name: Absorb Elements
Casting time: 1 reaction, which you take when you take acid, cold, ethereal, fire, lightning, shadow or sonic damage

Name: Chaos Bolt
Components: V, S, M (a kaosite worth at least 25 gp)

Name: Chromatic Orb
Components: V, S, M (a mystic quartz worth at least 50 gp)

Name: Color Spray
Components: V, S, M (a handful of sand or powder, which the spell consumes)

Name: Find Familiar
Components: V, S, M (10 gp worth of kaosite dust and herbs that must be consumed by fire, plus incense)

Name: Floating Disk
Components: V, S, M (a drop of mercury)

Name: Identify
Components: V, S, M (a mystic quartz worth at least 100 gp)

Name: Illusory Script
Components: S, M (an amethyst-based ink worth at least 10 gp, which the spell consumes)

Name: Protection from Evil or Good
Components: V, S, M (holy/unholy water, depending on target alignment, or powdered silver and iron, which the spell consumes)

Name: Snare
Components: V, S, M (25 feet of rope, which the spell consumes)

Components: V, S, M (gold dust worth at least 25 gp, which the spell consumes)

Name: Continual Flame
Components: V, S, M (ruby dust worth 50 gp, which the spell consumes)

Name: Digital Phantom

Name: Dust Devil
Components: V, S, M (a handful of dust/sand/powder, which the spell consumes)

Name: Gentle Repose
Components: V, S, M (holy water, which the spell consumes, and one coin placed on each of the corpse's eyes, which must remain there for the duration)

Name: Magic Mouth
Components: V, S, M (tanzanite dust worth at least 10 gp, which the spell consumes)

Name: Repair Drone
Components: V, S, M (a portable repair drone worth at least 50 gp)

Name: Rope Trick
Components: V, S, M (a rope up to 60 feet in length)

Components: V, S, M (a cosmic opal worth at least 100 gp)

Components: V, S, M (a piece of obsidian)

Name: Glyph of Warding
Components: V, S, M (incense and powdered gemstone worth at least 200 gp, which the spell consumes)

Name: Hypnotic Pattern

Name: Magic Circle
Components: V, S, M (a component depending on the effect, which the spell consumes)

Name: Nondetection
Components: V, S, M (apatite dust worth at least 25 gp sprinkled over the target, which the spell consumes)

Name: Remove Curse
Components: V, S, F, M (incense and one of the following: holy water, a vial of mercury worth at least 50 gp, diamond dust worth at least 50 gp, or cosmic opal dust worth at least 50 gp, all of which the spell consumes)

Name: Sending
Components: V, S, M (a lapis lazuli, a sapphire, a cosmic opal or a TSR device)

Name: Stinking Cloud
Components: V, S, M (a skull, a plaguestone, or a piece of material soaked in tainted water)

Name: Summon Lesser Demons
Components: V, S, M (a drop of your blood or garnet dust worth at least 25 gp, which the spell consumes, or a doomstone)

Name: Arcane Sanctum
Components: V, S, M (a handful of peridot dust, which the spell consumes, or a thin sheet of lead)

Name: Banishment
Components: V, S, M (an item distasteful to the target)

Name: Ethereal Guardian
Components: V, S, M (emerald dust worth at least 500 gp, which the spell consumes)

Name: Ethereal Storage
Components: V, S, M (an exquisite chest, 3 feet by 2 feet by 2 feet, constructed from rare materials worth at least 5,000 gp, and a Tiny replica made from the same materials worth at least 50 gp)

Name: Stoneskin
Components: V, S, M (a peridot worth 100 gp, which the spell consumes)

Components: V, S, M (a drop of your blood or garnet dust worth at least 100 gp, which the spell consumes, or a doomstone worth at least 500 gp)

Components: V, S, M (opal dust worth at least 25 gp, which the spell consumes, or a whole opal gemstone)

Components: V, S, M (an aquamarine worth at least 100 gp)

Components: V, S, M (a fiery beryl worth at least 100 gp)

Name: Infernal Calling
Components: V, S, M (a garnet or a doomstone worth at least 999 gp)

Name: Legend Lore
Components: V, S, M (incense worth at least 500 gp and four gems, all of which the spell consumes)

Name: Passwall
Components: V, S, M (a pinch of sesame seeds)

Name: Planar Binding
Components: V, S, F, M (a gemstone worth at least 1,000 gp, which the spell consumes)

Components: V, S, M (either an opal, or consumed gem dust worth 25 gp)

Components: V, S, M (a garnet or a doomstone worth at least 100 gp, which the spell consumes)

Components: V, S, M (an onyx worth at least 500 gp)

Components: V, S, M (a lightning ridge opal worth at least 1,500 gp)

Name: Create Familiar
Components: V, S, M (clay, ash, and mandrake root, all of which the spell consumes, a diamond dagger worth at least 1,000 gp)

Name: Create Undead
Components: V, S, M (an onyx worth at least 150 gp for each corpse)

Name: Guards and Wards
Components: V, S, M (burning incense imbued with grey spinel, emerald and amethyst dust worth at least 150 gp each)

Components: V, S, M (tanzanite dust worth at least 25 gp)
